description:
Jiruo is a Moon Whistle, young assistant instructor, at the Belchero Orphanage, once personally instructed by http://anidb.net/ch88493 [Riko]`s mother. While he is stern, he is also extremely perceptive and keen-minded, and behind his seemingly uncaring facade he is a compassionate and honest soul. He is commonly called "Leader" by his students. He is currently in his 20s.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Jiruo
